title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 19.5 - Disapproved claims
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 19.5 - Disapproved claims

State Regulations

Each agency may at its own discretion, adopt an appeals
process to handle situations where the finance officer or other designated
officer disapproves a claim, or where the claimant is not satisfied with the
amount approved on the claim. In the event a disapproved claim is subsequently
approved after an appeals proceeding, the steps set forth in section
19.3
of this Part for an approved
claim shall be followed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
19.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
